revised_title: The Impact of Early Nutrition on Brain Development and Myelination
tldr: The study investigates the effects of early nutrition on the growth and myelination of the brain in rats. It shows that varying the size of the litter at birth can significantly influence the rate of growth, and that early nutrition plays a crucial role in brain development. The research also highlights the importance of cholesterol in the structural development of the brain.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
